title: Service professionalism, cordiality, efficiency and excellent location
text:
Service professionalism, cordiality, efficiency and excellent location is what we received at this hotel
Having booked the room directly with the hotel, I confess that we received a very good deal and were offered a great variety of alternatives and suggestions based on our stay and budget.
Before arriving at the hotel, we did some shopping on Amazon.com and after check-in, that same first day of stay were already all the boxes waiting for us in the room. None of them was missing.
The staff at the front desk who took care of us to check in as well as any concerns we had was extremely cordial with us, to the point of assisting us even when we had to modify some of the reservation, always supporting us and providing us with convenient solutions. Particularly Miss Natalia made us feel at home, and so did Adrianne and Ari every time we asked them for support in the Front Desk, and Jorge in the breakfast area.
The hotel has a design and class that deserve to stand out. And to this must be added the professionalism of all the hotel staff.
The rooms although not very spacious -convenient this is not a feature of hotels in Manhattan- turns out to be very comfortable and organized to have an excellent stay. The cleanliness and hygiene is remarkable.
The location of the hotel is excellent for people like us who like to walk to neighborhoods like SoHo, NoLiTa, Meat Packing, Flatiron and 5th Avenue. Those looking to go shopping will find the best known brands a few blocks from the hotel.
Having visited the town about twenty times, we are with my lady practically certain that the Walker Greenwich Village Hotel will be our number one choice in the future.
